short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import characters from D&D Beyond or Pathbuilder into Bag of Mapping VTT. Help us improve accuracy by providing your feedback!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Subscribers to the Bag of Mapping VTT can use this extension to effortlessly bring characters from D&D Beyond or Pathbuilder! Whether you’re preparing for your next adventure or managing multiple characters, this tool imports as much information as possible.  It helps streamline the process so you can focus on your game.  Even as a free user you can use the extension as a bookmarker for your characters in D&D Beyond or Pathbuilder to be able to quickly jump to them while you're in game.

If you're a free user or subscribed you can use this extension to store links to map images or avatars that you find through out the web that you'd like to use during your next games.  Simply search google images (or any images online) and right click on an image and add it to the extension as a map or as an avatar.

We’re working hard to make this feature as comprehensive as possible, but we need your help! Your feedback will help us improve the accuracy and depth of character imports. Try it out and let us know how we can make it even better.
